basics.name: Berkay Gündüz
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am a software developer with experience in full-stack development, software analysis, and deep learning applications. I am skilled in Python, Java, C/C++, TypeScript, and various frameworks and technologies including Django, Vue.js, TensorFlow, MySQL, Git, Bash Script, and Docker.

work.name: Cape of Good Code GmbH
work.summary: Developing software analysis solutions for the DETANGLE Analysis Suite using Python, Django, Vue.js, Git, and Jira.

work.name: Nart Bilişim Hizmetleri
work.summary: Developed full-stack solutions for the STAR project - Turkcell’s network discovery, inventory, and alarm management software.

work.name: Nart Bilişim Hizmetleri
work.summary: Developed a network discovery script and solutions for major issues.

courses: 414th rank over 2.5 million in the Higher Education Institutions Exam
Graduated as valedictorian from the high school before university

projects.name: geddit
projects.summary: A Django API service to wrap Reddit posts.

projects.name: Moondark
projects.summary: Aims to generate music like Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata and Erik Satie's Gymnopédie 1 with LSTM using Python 3 and TensorFlow.

projects.name: Lucid Dreams
projects.summary: A 2D platformer game with the feature of a custom-level editor using Java and PostgreSQL.

projects.name: Ozan
projects.summary: A collection of projects that aims to create songs like Turkish folk musician Aşık Veysel with artificial neural networks using Python for TÜBITAK 2204-A High School Students Research Students Competition.

volunteer.summary: Maintenance of the WordPress websites of the Department of Computer Engineering and Faculty of Engineering. Lab tutor for CS 115 - Introduction to Programming in Python, and for CS 102 Algorithms and Programming II (Java).
As the chair of the Computer Society, led various organizations with 500+ participants.
